name: Aufbau eines bundesweiten Modell- und Demonstrationsnetzwerks für Agroforstwirtschaft in Deutschland
programme: Federal Ministry of Food and Agriculture (BMEL), Sustainable Renewable Resources
description:
Establishment of a nationwide agroforestry demonstration network with flagship sites to significantly expand agroforestry in Germany.
13 partners - 3 model regions across 7 Federal states - 34 farms - new establishments and older agroforestry systems - scientific reserach concerning crop production, ecology and economy - public relations - knowledge transfer
The MODEMA project is supported by funds of the Federal Ministry of Food and Agriculture (BMEL) based on a decision of the Parliament of the Federal Republic of Germany via Agency for Renewable Resources (FNR) under the funding programme Sustainable Renewable Resources.
